diagrams.description: A flowchart showing the fundamental concepts and structure of Digital Humanities.
diagrams.mermaid_code:
flowchart TD
    DigitalHumanities[Digital Humanities] --> Digitization[Digitization]
    DigitalHumanities --> Analysis[Computational Analysis]
    DigitalHumanities --> Visualization[Visualization]
    Digitization --> Archives[Digital Archives]
    Digitization --> Texts[Digital Texts]
    Analysis --> TextMining[Text Mining]
    Analysis --> Network[Network Analysis]
    Visualization --> Mapping[Spatial Mapping]
    Visualization --> Timelines[Temporal Visualization]
